mapper.sql: id, phone, real_name, nickname, head_img_url, user_type, country, province, city, gender, has_password, source, remark, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at

update ch_user

real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

deleted_at = #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
